title: The Night Before Christmas 1978 (Drama film) Christopher George, Gay Hamilton

sources.title: The Night Before Christmas 1978 (Drama film) Christopher George, Gay Hamilton
sources.description:
The story about an estranged couple and their terminal ill son.

Original title: Questo si che è amore (1978) AKA: The Night Before Christmas/ The Day Santa Claus Cried / Last Touch of Love

This film is available in English and subtitled in many languages

Director: Filippo Ottoni
Writers: Enrico Oldoini, Filippo Ottoni, Sonia Molteni
Stars: Christopher George, Gay Hamilton, Sven Valsecchi
Genres: Italian cinema, Drama 


00:00 Full movie (with subtitles)
03:39 A young boy with a rare condition encounters life-changing moments in a hospital with unexpected allies.
11:51 A family deals with divorce, a sensitive child in isolation, and a pet dog that brings them closer.
25:21 Family tension and celebrations ignite in a story of misunderstandings and connection.
33:24 Secrets, humor, and a life-changing delivery bring new depth to family bonds.
42:14 A boy, longing for his father’s love, finds a powerful bond with his loyal dog.
48:11 Amidst family struggles, a young boy searches for understanding and friendship.
1:00:09 Friendship and hope bloom during Christmas in this heartwarming chapter.
1:24:10 Tommy’s plan to visit home on Christmas Eve brings drama and excitement.
1:29:35 A touching Christmas reunion celebrates the love between a boy and his parents.
